title: Trig or Treat - Ning Hong Yeo
description:
Trig Or Treat: An Encyclopedia of Trigonometric Identity Proofs With Intellectually Challenging Games

by Ning Hong Yeo


# Pages     : 416 pages
# Publisher : World Scientific Publishing Company (October 2007)
# ISBN      : 9812776184
# Format    : PDF


This encyclopedia contains trigonometric identity proofs for some three hundred identities. The book is presented in the form of mathematical games for the reader s enjoyment and includes a concordance of trigonometric identities, enabling easy reference.

Trig or Treat is a must-have for: every student of trigonometry, to find the proofs for trigonometric identities that may be set in class or in exams; every teacher of trigonometry, to have easy access to trigonometric identities of different levels of difficulty, to set assignments for different levels of students; every library, to provide a ready resource for students every aficionado of Sudoku, crossword puzzles, jigsaw puzzles, Tetris, and other games, who love an intellectual challenge
